attributes.action: Exile All Britsh IS Jehadists From Ever Returning To UK
attributes.additional_details: I believe it to be necessary that, all and any future British nationals wishing to join the abhorrent IS killers in Iraq be, EXILED from this United Kingdom, Should they be ever allowed to return to the UK they will no doubt eventually, become an recruitment tool for all and any future, Islamic Terror Organisation; We owe it to our own law abiding citizens they, Be Protected' from these zealot's, we require that this Government, takes the immediate action before it is too late, lets not have another Seven - Seven.
